welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Haedo, Argentina! Get ready to be charmed by our vibrant city known for its warm hospitality and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Haedo has to offer. Bienvenidos!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Palomar Airport, serving domestic flights within Argentina.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at El Palomar Airport, serving international flights to neighboring countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights at Ezeiza Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal for domestic flights at Ezeiza Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
